#summary How to include hibernate-memcached in your Maven build
#labels Featured

= Repository =
Add the following Repository to your pom.xml
{{{
<repository>
    <id>hibernate-memcached</id>
    <name>hibernate-memcached</name>
    <url>http://raykrueger.googlecode.com/svn/repository</url>
</repository>
}}}

Once I release a 1.0 I'll try to have it uploaded to the main Maven repository.

= Dependency =
Your dependency on hibernate-memcached will be...
{{{
<dependency>
    <groupId>com.googlecode</groupId>
    <artifactId>hibernate-memcached</artifactId>
    <version>1.2</version>
</dependency>
}}}
